---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(gridlayout)
library(glue)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

knitr::knit_engines$set(gridlayout = function(options) {
  code <- paste(options$code, collapse = "\n")
  if (options$eval) {
    layout <- gridlayout::md_to_gridlayout(code)
    css_for_layout <- glue::glue(
      "<style>",
      "{to_css(layout, container = '.main-container')}",
      "</style>",
      .sep = "\n"
    )
  }
  options$results <- "asis"
  options$echo <- FALSE
  knitr::engine_output(
    options, 
    code = options$code, 
    out = css_for_layout
  )
})
```
